verbs.description: It [V: seems] [ARG1: like every single day brings a new story about how corrupt Environmental Protection Agency head Scott Pruitt is . And if Tuesday ’s story is n’t quite as weird as Monday ’s story about Pruitt having an aide try to buy a used mattress from a Trump] ...
